main event: A witness observed a light blue-grey object approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter hovering at an estimated altitude of 2000 to 3000 feet in Chesapeake, Virginia on January 15, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10-15 minutes before it disappeared abruptly., The sighting was reported during a telephone interview., The witness described seeing undersized creatures, possibly four feet tall, wearing trousers and T-shirts., The witness was coherent but under mental strain during the report., There was originally insufficient data for evaluation of the incident.
sighted object: light blue-grey object hovering in the sky
witness description: The witness reported seeing an unidentifiable large oblong object and described potential creatures resembling humans.
